about_the_game:
An experimental musical composition inside videogame mechanics.

An au​diovisual asemic codex.

Featuring:

  • a blend of ink doodles, claymotion and shaders, rendered in crunchy 540p
  • battle against strange entities with an unusually obscure gameplay*
  • xenmodal microtuned music

* interactive tutorial included!

Game Modes:

  • 1P Journey is for single player
  • 2P Versus is for local player vs player
  • Jukebox let you listen to the computer playing against itself
  • Tutorial is for learning how to play

Controls ( reconfigurable in settings ) :

  • wasd / arrows / dpad
  • Enter / K : accept
  • Backspace / J : cancel
  • ESC / select: pause menus, goes back in menus

Full Game Release:


probably in may 2023.

Minimum:
  • OS: any distro with X11 and glibc > 2.29
  • Processor: Intel i5 3rd gen or equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: any graphic card supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 41 MB available space
